SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.label: Short-term Debt, Interest Rate Increase
ShortTermDebtInterestRateIncrease.description: Percentage increase in the stated interest rate on a short-term debt instrument.

ShortTermNonBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Non-bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermNonBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a creditor other than a bank with a maturity within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.label: Short-term Debt, Average Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, average borrowings during the period.

ShorttermDebtFairValue.label: Short-term Debt, Fair Value
ShorttermDebtFairValue.description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents the amount of short-term debt existing as of the balance sheet date.

SponsorFees.label: Sponsor Fees
SponsorFees.description: Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.label: Stock and Warrants Issued During Period, Value, Preferred Stock and Warrants
StockAndWarrantsIssuedDuringPeriodValueP.description: Value of preferred stock and warrants for common stock issued.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: The number of shares issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForCa.label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Shares, Issued for Cash (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForCa.description: Number of shares issued as consideration for cash for development stage entities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities, Net of Adjustments
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForCas.label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Value, Issued for Cash (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForCas.description: Value of shares issued as consideration for cash for development stage entities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued, Value, Stock Options Exercised, Net of Tax Benefit (Expense)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options, after deduction of related income tax (expense) benefit.

SuppliesAndPostageExpense.label: Supplies and Postage Expense
SuppliesAndPostageExpense.description: The aggregate amount of expenses directly related to the supplies and postage.

SuppliesExpense.label: Supplies Expense
SuppliesExpense.description: Amount of expense associated with supplies that were used during the current accounting period.

TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Valuation Allowance
TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.description: Amount of valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from tax credit carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.label: Travel and Entertainment Expense
TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits Resulting in Net Operating Loss Carryforward (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.description: Amount of an unrecognized tax benefit that is directly related to a position taken in a tax year that results in a net operating loss carryforward. This amount is presented as a reduction of the related deferred tax asset in the balance sheet if that deferred tax asset is not used. This amount is presented separately from the deferred tax asset for a net operating loss carryforward if this unrelated tax benefit is associated with a different tax position.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseImpairments.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Impairments
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseImpairments.description: Amount of operating expense for impairments of regulated operation.

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.label: Weighted Average Basic Shares Outstanding, Pro Forma
WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Finance Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeFinanceLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of finance lease payments.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

AdjustmentForAmortization.label: Amortization
AdjustmentForAmortization.description: The aggregate amount of recurring noncash expense charged against earnings in the period to allocate the cost of assets over their estimated remaining economic lives.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

InterestExpenseDebtExcludingAmortization.label: Interest Expense, Debt, Excluding Amortization
InterestExpenseDebtExcludingAmortization.description: Represents the portion of interest incurred in the period on debt arrangements that was charged against earnings, excluding amortization of debt discount (premium) and financing costs.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.label: Unrealized Loss on Foreign Currency Derivatives, before Tax
UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.description: Amount of unrealized loss recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income pertaining to the decrease in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments to the extent that a cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs and Discounts
AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

BasicEarningsPerShareProForma.label: Basic Earnings Per Share, Pro Forma
BasicEarningsPerShareProForma.description: Pro forma basic earnings per share or earnings per unit, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Including Equity Interest in Acquiree Held Prior to Combination
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Fair value at acquisition-date of the assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interests issued by the acquirer, including but not limited to, instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

ConvertiblePreferredStockConvertedToOthe.label: Convertible Preferred Stock Converted to Other Securities
ConvertiblePreferredStockConvertedToOthe.description: Value of convertible preferred stock that was converted to other securities.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

DilutedEarningsPerShareProForma.label: Diluted Earnings Per Share Pro Forma
DilutedEarningsPerShareProForma.description: Pro forma diluted earnings per share, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings.

IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesNetOfTax.label: Income (Loss) from Subsidiaries, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Call Options and Warrants
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of call options and warrants using the treasury stock method.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Period Increase (Decrease)
MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Net Increase or Decrease in balance of noncontrolling interest in the subsidiary during the reporting period.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

PaymentsForDeposits.label: Payments for Deposits
PaymentsForDeposits.description: The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Lower Range Limit
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The floor of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Upper Range Limit
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The ceiling of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

AccruedIncomeTaxesNoncurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Noncurrent
AccruedIncomeTaxesNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

AssetsNeededForImmediateSettlementAggreg.label: Assets Needed for Immediate Settlement, Aggregate Fair Value
AssetsNeededForImmediateSettlementAggreg.description: The aggregate fair value of assets needed to immediately settle the derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features if the credit-risk-related contingent features were triggered at the end of the reporting period.

DepositContractsAssets.label: Deposit Contracts, Assets
DepositContractsAssets.description: Carrying amount of assets as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts paid by the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.

DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.label: Disposal Group, Deferred Gain on Disposal
DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.description: "The excess amount received or due over net assets in a transaction accounted for as a divestiture where a subsidiary, business or operating assets are ""sold"" by the entity to a newly formed, thinly capitalized, highly leveraged buyer. This gain is not yet recognized and is disclosed on the balance sheet as an offset against the carrying amount of the securities received."

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Foreign Currency Translation Gains (Losses)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) in the disposal group, including discontinued operation, recognized in the statement of income as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRestrictedCertificatesO.label: Payments to Acquire Restricted Certificates of Deposit
PaymentsToAcquireRestrictedCertificatesO.description: The cash outflow from temporary investment with specific maturity and interest rate that are prohibited for current use.

ProceedsFromOtherDeposits.label: Proceeds from Other Deposits
ProceedsFromOtherDeposits.description: Amount of cash inflow for receipts of deposits classified as other.

RetainedEarningsAppropriated.label: Retained Earnings, Appropriated
RetainedEarningsAppropriated.description: A segregation of retained earnings which is unavailable for dividend distribution. Includes also retained earnings appropriated for loss contingencies.
